about_the_game:
You are missioned to stimulate one of the planets in Dignacia universe. Feed your animals and plant your seeds with using advanced technology. Upgrade your tools, build up your world, explore the mysteries of the planet, dive into water and dig out its secrets. Manage the city that you build, pull tourists to your world. Use your guns if necessary and destroy bad creatures for fulfilling your needs and bringing peace!

Dignacia, is a building civilization, farming and action rogue-lite type of game with pixel graphics, that you can play while laying on your back.

Build your civilization!

Build your farm, plant your seeds and feed your animals in that planet which you came for bringing the life again! Build constructions and engage in tourism with ultimate aim to make people live in that planet. Trade with different merchants. Manage your shop in the Heart of Dignacia and purchase robots for making them assist you.

Fall into Dark Planets which includes Rogue-Lite elements!

Dignacia is in danger! Put your armor on, pull your guns on for eliminating reavers in the dark planets named Dungeons. Go to Dungeons, each one different from the other, and fight your enemies. You can add some materials that you found in Dungeons into your inventory if you need them in your world. But, if you die in Dungeons, you start from the beginning and lose almost everything you have collected.

Upgrade Your Character and Planet!

You can almost upgrade everyting on this planet, your character, tools, buildings and even the shape of the planet! Make all the improvements and get stronger!

This is your world, customize as you wish!

You can customize your character as you wish, you can provide your own custom profile. You can build your city and planet , organise the structure as you wish. It's totally up to you!

Fulfill Your Duty!

The government of Dignacia will send you a list of the things you must do on the planet. Complete to-do list, fulfill your duty, win prizes!

Explore the Dignacia Universe!

Obtain information about Dignacia Universe from your planet, Heart of Dignacia and Dungeons. Make discoveries about the history of the universe. But, don't step over the line, you are just a government employee.
